document_data.name: Kaylinn
document_data.mainbody: '''Kaylinn''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Kelemvor]] in the city of [[Ormpetarr]] in [[Sespech]].
document_data.Description: Kaylinn was short, with wide hips and full breasts.  Her head was shaven, except for a characteristic sidelock of auburn hair wrapped in thin white leather straps that went down past her shoulder. At the base of her skull where it met the spine was a blue outlined inked tattoo depicting the sign of Kelemvor, a skeletal hand holding a set of scales.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], she served as high priestess in Ormpetarr.
